ThingDef.label: Huntsman's totem (Infernal Claws)
ThingDef.description: A rare totem of the hunt, a skull seemingly made entirely out of a strange crystal. Totems such as are nothing more than peculiar collectibles. Their true value can only be uncovered by those blessed with The Huntsman's blood.\n\nA lycanthrope can use this totem to instantly unlock the Infernal Claws for use in beast form.
